img_text: abeto Venezuela Braz MAGE LLAN G Did you know that 60 years ago Venezuela was 2 times richer Than China? 4 times richer than Japan? It was the 4th ranked World economy, (1st in Latin America). It's health system was the best in the western world. It's currency was 2nd only to the U.S. Dollar. In only 10 years Venezuela was destroyed by SOCIALISM.
